name: Abilis New England
tag_list: custom-it-solutions, it-consulting, systems-integration, intranet-portals, website-development, content-management, integrated-solutions, erp
overview:
Abilis New England, a division of Abilis Solutions, delivers IT projects in state government, healthcare and the financial sector.

Abilis New England specializes in systems and technology integration as well as the development and production of customized applications. With offices in Portland, Maine, Abilis New England reaches clients throughout the United States.

Abilis New England distinguishes itself with its innovation ability, the high level of technological knowledge and productivity of its delivery teams and with a delivery promise based on a fixed-priced approach.
